page.internal-name: Treatment of scabies in dogs and cats
page.diseaseName_s: Treatment of scabies in dogs and cats
page.diseaseContent_html:
CONCEPT

Diseases caused by E.coli bacteria when developing in pig intestine produce foreign toxins and these substances seep into blood poisoning body

The role of E.coli bacteria is primary, there should be more favorable primary factors: dirty dirty cages; Unable to control the quantity & quality of food.


DISEASE SIGNS

The disease usually arises in pigs of about 25 - 50kg and in fat pigs; The two main signs of diseased pigs are edema and movement disorders

- Edema: clearly visible around the eyes and forehead

- Movement disorders: pigs have seizures or paralysis of the hind legs.

Slaughter of pigs will see:

- Accumulate fluid in chest sinuses, abdominal sinuses

- Perforated intestinal perforated membrane, Pneumonia


SOLUTION

Separate sick pigs. Concentrate on taking care of the pigs that are not sick, if the whole farm is as good (this is the key point)

* For pigs not yet sick:

- Reduce the amount of food to 2/3, for easy-to-digest foods (like adding porridge); No feeding after 17h. When the situation decreases, it will gradually increase the amount of food again. After 60kg / pig will feed freely

- Acidify food with ACID MIXED (mix water for drinking), add probiotics as BIO ACIMIN Gold (mix into food). Use continuously for at least 10 days

- Enhance metabolism with MEKOSAL (injected once a week); Immediately inject 1 dose of VITAMIN ADE per pig (2 months after injection)

- Use BYE-CILOX + APRA-COLIS to mix with food continuously for at least 10 days

- Immediately give each dose of CL-AMOXGEN 1 dose (only need 1 time)

- After intervention for about 5 days, use VIMILAC PLUS 2 (mix food at least 5 days), then use MKV- GROWTH NEW to mix with food

* With sick pigs: very difficult to treat

- Immediately inject 1 dose of TROFURIT

- 2 hours after an additional dose of TROFURIT + 1 dose of HEPTAMINOL (or caffeine) + 1 dose of DEXASONE

- 2 hours after 1 dose of CATAXIM (or CL-AMOXGEN)

- 1 dose of CL-AMOXGEN daily (at least 3 days), 1 dose of CAFEIN, for additional SORBITOL

- Feed sick pigs likepigs that are not sick

* With barns:

- Need to keep dry, warm, clean. Absolutely do not put chickens, ducks and dogs in the pigpen

- Disinfect barns once a day

* Prevention:

- Pigs from 20 to 50kg / pig should be fed quantitatively in combination with acidifiers, probiotics

- Arranging enough food trough

- When stressed or when in doubt, use APRA-COLIS to mix with food for at least 3 days.
